name: SRCH2
overview:
Big Data, data-driven apps, and new mobile platforms have put enormous strains on search. Is your search capability up to the task? SRCH2 offers next-gen search software, built from the ground up to address the unmet needs of a data-driven world.

SRCH2 is built to harness the strengths of the modern big data stack (it resides wholly in-memory, deploys multi-threaded queries, uses cached forward indexing to enable instant recommendations and does rapid geo search, with real-time updates, all in parallel).

With its groundbreaking algorithmic and programmatic innovations, SRCH2 is up to 10X faster than Solr, the most widely deployed search software.

Here are some features: *Faster results for multiple simultaneous queries *Finding results instantly (not query-log based query suggestions like Google) *Rapid geo-search *Error tolerance using advanced fuzzy-search techniques *Ranking customization based on client preferences and business logic *Real-time updates *All of the above simultaneously in one engine
